word: THE BURDEN OF HEART CARRIED BY MRS. WHITE, HER SENSE OF HER RESPONSIBILITY TO THOSE IN SUFFERING AND NEED ABOUT HER, AND HER EAGERNESS TO HELP, THOUGH SEEMINGLY EVER HAMPERED BY LIMITED RESOURCES, SHOULD ENCOURAGE EVERY SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTIST TO GREATER AND MORE ENTHUSIASTIC PARTICIPATION IN WELFARE MINISTRY.--COMPILERS.]
